name: DrawMeaPicture
0:
”Alexa draw me a picture”
”draw me flowers”
”draw me a house”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: draw me a picture
des:
We asked Alexa to draw us a picture and it could not so we made a skill that would. To fully enjoy this skill you should invoke it on a device with a display like a Show or Spot.

Using this skill you can ask Alexa to draw a picture and it will display original artwork on request. If you launch the skill it will randomly show you a picture or you can ask for a specific picture. We're keeping track of requested pictures we don't currently have and will frequently update to include new additions.

You can also ask draw me a picture to display specific pictures. For example, Alexa ask draw me a picture for flowers or ask draw me a picture to draw me flowers.

Note: Alexa sometimes confuses this skill's invocation name for other requests so you it may require more than try.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
